data.headline: Experienced Product Manager with a Background in Software Engineering
data.summary: As a seasoned Product Manager with a strong technical background, I have a proven track record of driving successful product development and delivering innovative solutions that meet customer needs. With expertise in agile methodologies, data-driven decision making, and cross-functional collaboration, I am adept at navigating complex challenges and leading high-performing teams to achieve business objectives.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Spearheaded the development and launch of a new SaaS platform, resulting in a 25% increase in customer acquisition within the first year.
Collaborated closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product roadmaps and prioritize features based on customer feedback and market trends.
Implemented agile best practices, including sprint planning, retrospectives, and continuous improvement, to drive efficient and effective product development.
Leveraged data analytics to monitor product performance, identify areas for optimization, and make data-driven decisions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Designed and developed scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, contributing to the successful delivery of multiple projects.
Participated in Scrum ceremonies, including daily standups, sprint planning, and retrospectives, to ensure effective team collaboration and continuous improvement.
Advocated for user-centric design principles and worked closely with UX designers to enhance the overall product experience.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Lena Müller, a mid-career product manager with a technical background, looking confident and approachable.
